t:test_case.t:objective: basic system check
create test account
Login to the test account and search to get message Ids
t:test_case.t:steps: 1. Login to the account. 2. Search a mail to get the message-id

t:test_case.t:objective: Adding flag to the 6 messages
Mark 6 messages as read
Reply to 6 mails
forward the 6 mails
Creating folders in proper structure
Moving messages(mails) to respected folders
Verify that a search for flagged mail in corresponding folders is successful using tag:\Flagged
Verify that a search for unflagged mails in corresponding folders is successful using tag:\Unflagged
Verify that a search for read mail in corresponding folders is successful tag:\Read
Verify that a search for unread mails in corresponding folders is successful
Verify that a search for reply (answered) mail in corresponding folders is successful using tag:\Replied
Verify that a search for forward mails in corresponding folders is successful tag:\Forwarded
Verify that a search for flagged mail in corresponding folders is successful using tag:\Flagged (for conversation)
Verify that a search for unflagged mails in corresponding folders is successful using tag:\Unflagged (for conversation)
Verify that a search for read mail in corresponding folders is successful tag:\Read (for conversation)
Verify that a search for unread mails in corresponding folders is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for replied (answered) mail in corresponding folders is successful using tag:\Replied
Verify that a search for forward mails in corresponding folders is successful tag:\Forwarded (for conversation)
Verify that a search for sent mails is successful tag:\Sent (for conversation)
Verify that a search for mails with attachment is successful tag:\Attached (for conversation)
Verify that a search for draft mails is successful tag:\Drafts (for conversation)
t:test_case.t:steps: 1. Save a draft message 2. Search with query tag:\Drafts

t:test_case.t:objective: Verify that a search for deleted mails is successful tag:\Deleted (for conversation)
t:test_case.t:steps: 1. Move one mail to Trash 2. Search deleted mails with query tag:\Deleted

t:test_case.t:objective: Verify that a search for deleted mails is successful tag:\Deleted (for conversation)
t:test_case.t:steps: 1. Modify the option "zimbraPrefNewMailNotificationEnabled" for new mail notification 2. Sent a mail to itself 3. Login to test_account1.name 4. Search for Notified mails
